data.title: Darth Vader Sculptor Star Wars
data.meta_description: Authentic Brian Muir autographs for sale. Sculptor of Star Wars Darth Vader signed memorabilia. Autographs come with Certificate of Authenticity.
data.text:
Brian Muir Autographs Darth Vader Star Wars

Authentic Brian Muir autographs for sale. Sculptor of Star Wars Darth Vader signed memorabilia.

Brian Muir Autographs offers a collection of authentic autographed memorabilia from Brian Muir. A renowned sculptor known for his work on iconic films such as Star Wars. Each autograph is carefully authenticated and comes with a certificate of authenticity. Authentic autographs from Brian Muir – Wide selection of memorabilia, including signed photographs, posters, and props. Each autograph comes with a certificate of authenticity – Perfect for collectors and fans of Brian Muir’s work.

Darth Vader Autographs

Own a piece of film history with a genuine autograph from Brian Muir – Guaranteed authenticity for peace of mind. Ideal for display or as a unique gift for movie enthusiasts – Support the work of a talented artist and sculptor.

Brian Ian Muir, one of the most respected sculptors and artists in the film industry, has been working in film for over 46 years. In 1968, at the age of 16, he began his 4 year apprenticeship as a sculptor/modeler at Elstree Film Studios.

Brian Muir Star Wars signed memorabilia

In addition, after completing his apprenticeship, Brian Muir left the film industry. He honed his skills by working on many prestigious commissions in London i.e. Royal Coat of Arms for the Crown Court and plaque for Stock Exchange (unveiled by the Queen).

Also, in 1976 Brian, asked to return to Elstree Studios to work on Star Wars and sculpted the now infamous Darth Vader. He also sculpted the Storm Trooper Armour, Death Star Droid,CZ 3 and finishing work on C3PO.

Additionally, apart from Star Wars, he worked on over 70 other movies. Including Alien (for which he co-created the Space Jockey) and Raiders of the Lost Ark (for which he worked on the Ark of the Covenant prop).

Authentic Brian Muir signed Star Wars photo

Furthermore, Muir wrote an autobiography, In the Shadow of Vader, which released on 19 December 2009. In addition, he appears in many conventions of Film memorabilia and prop makers.

Authentic Brian Muir autographs for sale.
